method.name: Get3DTextureColor
method.abstract: Returns one color of a 3d texture.

method.name: Get3DTextureColorCoefficient
method.abstract: Returns one color coefficient of a 3d texture.

method.name: Get3DTextureOrientation
method.abstract: Returns the orientation of a texture.

method.name: Get3DTexturePosition
method.abstract: Returns the position of a texture.

method.name: Get3DTextureScale
method.abstract: Returns the scale of a texture.

method.name: GetAmbientColor
method.abstract: Returns the ambient color of a material.

method.name: GetDiffuseColor
method.abstract: Returns the diffuse color of a material.

method.name: GetSpecularColor
method.abstract: Returns the specular color of a material.

method.name: GetTransparencyColor
method.abstract: Returns the transparent color of a material.

method.name: Put3DTextureColor
method.abstract: Sets one color of a 3d texture.

method.name: Put3DTextureColorCoefficient
method.abstract: Sets one color coefficient of a 3d texture.

method.name: Put3DTextureOrientation
method.abstract: Sets the orientation of a texture.

method.name: Put3DTexturePosition
method.abstract: Sets the position of a texture.

method.name: Put3DTextureScale
method.abstract: Sets the scale of a texture.

method.name: PutAmbientColor
method.abstract: Sets the ambient color of a material.

method.name: PutDiffuseColor
method.abstract: Sets the diffuse color of a material.

method.name: PutSpecularColor
method.abstract: Sets the specular color of a material.

method.name: PutTransparencyColor
method.abstract: Sets the transparent color of a material.

method.name: AdaptiveCoeff
method.abstract: Returns or sets the adaptive coeffcient of a material.

method.name: AmbientCoefficient
method.abstract: Returns or sets the ambient coefficient of a material.

method.name: Bump
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture bump.

method.name: ChessboardJointHeight
method.abstract: Returns or sets the height of the join of a chessboard texture.

method.name: ChessboardJointWidth
method.abstract: Returns or sets the width of the join of a chessboard texture.

method.name: ChessboardOffset
method.abstract: Returns or sets the offset coefficient for a chessboard texture.

method.name: ChessboardTileHeight
method.abstract: Returns or sets the height of the tile of a chessboard texture.

method.name: ChessboardTileWidth
method.abstract: Returns or sets the width of the tile of a chessboard texture.

method.name: ColorNumber
method.abstract: Returns or sets the 3d texture color number.

method.name: DiffuseCoefficient
method.abstract: Returns or sets the diffuse coefficient of a material.

method.name: EnvironmentImage
method.abstract: Returns or sets the environment image pathname of a material.

method.name: FlipU
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture flip status along U axis.

method.name: FlipV
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture flip status along V axis.

method.name: MappingType
method.abstract: Returns or sets the mapping type of a material.

method.name: Orientation
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture orientation.

method.name: PositionU
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture position along U axis.

method.name: PositionV
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture position along V axis.

method.name: PreviewSize
method.abstract: Returns or sets the preview size of a material.

method.name: ReflectionHeight
method.abstract: Returns or sets the non-linear reflection height of a material.

method.name: ReflectionLength
method.abstract: Returns or sets the non-linear reflection length of a material.

method.name: ReflectionMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the non-linear reflection mode of a material.

method.name: ReflectivityCoefficient
method.abstract: Returns or sets the reflectivity coefficient of a material.

method.name: RefractionCoefficient
method.abstract: Returns or sets the refraction coefficient of a material.

method.name: RepeatU
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture repeat status along U axis.

method.name: RepeatV
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture repeat status along V axis.

method.name: ScaleU
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture scale along U axis.

method.name: ScaleV
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture scale along V axis.

method.name: SpecularCoefficient
method.abstract: Returns or sets the specular coefficient of a material.

method.name: SpecularExponent
method.abstract: Returns or sets the specular exponent of a material.

method.name: TextureAmplitude
method.abstract: Returns or sets the 3d texture amplitude coefficient.

method.name: TextureComplexity
method.abstract: Returns or sets the 3d texture complexity.

method.name: TextureGain
method.abstract: Returns or sets the 3d texture gain coefficient.

method.name: TextureImage
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture image pathname of a material.

method.name: TexturePerturbation
method.abstract: Returns or sets the 3d texture perturbation coefficient.

method.name: TextureTurbulence
method.abstract: Returns or sets the 3d texture turbulence status.

method.name: TextureType
method.abstract: Returns or sets the texture type of a material.

method.name: TextureVeinAmplitude
method.abstract: Returns or sets the 3d texture vein amplitude coefficient.

method.name: TransparencyCoefficient
method.abstract: Returns or sets the transparency coefficient of a material.
